card.note: No matter what you do, always put forth your best!
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: Go out there and do something remarkable.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: We have two for you. First: A strong faith in God. Second: It's not what happens to you, it's how you deal with it that matters.
card.author: The Drums

card.note: Good times are easy to navigate. Tough times and events will test you, and it's how you deal with those events that will define you.
card.author: The Drums

card.note: All people need to be acknowledged. Do your best to take the time to let someone know that you notice them with a smile, a "wink" or a few words. It will make a difference in their life and yours. /R/R/R
card.author: Love, Grammy and Grampy

card.note: "Proceed as if success is inevitable"/R-Unknown
card.author: Trav & Jenny

card.note: Be authentic. Be humble. Work hard. Show your real strength through compassion, kindness and gentleness. Always be learning. Be grateful...you have much to be thankful for. Your intellect, integrity, faith and character set you apart. You can make a real difference.
card.author: Ann & Kennan Bridge

card.note: Remember to be yourself on each and every day of your new adventure. Watching you grow up it was always clear that you would be a man of character, integrity, warmth, love and intelligence and our world needs more just like you! We love you!!
card.author: Colette, Russ, Britt, Meg & Brian

card.note: Christopher - Just 1 tip!? Work to live, don't live to work, hard work will always get noticed -but if it takes too long LEAVE, and dream REALLY big cuz you're smart enough that your dreams WILL come true.
card.author: The Lack Family

card.note: Congratulations on achieving your degree! Since you're older than me I have no life advice to give you that you probably don't already know. So here's my favorite quote: /R"When you feel like quitting, remember why you started."
card.author: Aaron Castillo

card.note: Invest time in friendships, they are one of the few things that can truly last a lifetime.
card.author: The Berejikians

card.note: In the words of your fellow Christopher (Robin), "You're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." Sometimes you'll feel too young or ill-equipped to deal with a situation. But you're bright and brave enough to handle anything, buddy.
card.author: Jessica Lack

card.note: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams, live the life you've imagined. /R
card.author: Love, Jon and Joan

card.note: There are four very important words in life - love, honesty, truth and respect. Without these in your life you have nothing.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: "Be who are and say what you feel because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind" -Dr. Seuss.
card.author: Casey Nicole

card.note: I love when you talk all about your day with me. Decompress from work then relax and have fun when you are home. /RI'm so proud of you, darling and I can't wait to see what the future holds for you.
card.author: Casey Nicole

card.note: Trust your first gut feeling.
card.author: Love, Mrs. Q.

card.note: Don't give up too soon just because you don't think you'll succeed...you never know what will happen!/R/RAnd never use LIFO!!
card.author: Rebecca Lack

card.note: Congratulations! We are proud of you! Can't believe you're all grown up! Good luck to you...best wishes for an amazing future!
card.author: Auntie, Scott, Haley, Dylan, Hayden

card.note: You are a solitary gift to humankind. You bring a unique package of mind, heart, spirit and skills to the world. With that unique package, you have a unique responsibility to share it with others.
card.author: Love, GUV and GAP

card.note: When everyone goes right..../RGo left! /R/R/RCongratulations!!
card.author: Love, Rich and April

card.note: Eat more food with variety, learn to cook, and before deferring to your life's work, travel and do one or two whacky things AND THEN DIG IN!
card.author: Love, Nana

card.note: You are off to a great start and now your new race begins. I know you will do well and I can't wait to see where you go!
card.author: Love, Nana

card.note: Planning, preparation and process makes every task easier.
card.author: Uncle Jeff, Auntie M. and Cooper

card.note: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: When you feel lost or confused, follow your heart. You've got a good one :)
card.author: Sarah Lack

card.note: Wake up with determination. /RGo to bed with satisfaction.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: Follow your passion, stay true to yourself, never follow someonelse’s path unless you’re in the woods and you’re lost and you see a path then by all means you should follow that.
card.author: Grayson

card.note: The day is long /Rand the pay is small, /Rso take your time /Rand enjoy it all.
card.author: Jerome P. Solari

card.note: Earn. Save. Spend./R(not always in that order)/R/RGive. Receive./R(always in that order)/R
card.author: Dad

card.note: Above all, let the morality you've developed guide as many of your decisions as possible.
card.author: Dad

card.note: Everyone wants to do well. /RIf you are not also doing good, just doing well /Rwill never be enough. /R/R
card.author: Sarah
